summary: Disables interior background music in Hearthfire homesteads. Useful for the bard improvement/hireling if the overlapping music annoys you.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod removes the standard interior background music for all 3 Hearthfire homesteads. Useful if you use the bard hireling/improvement, and the overlapping music annoys you. There are two versions: 

The main version removes the background music from the homestead interiors, but does not affect the cellars, so normal background music may still play. 

The optional version removes all background music from the homesteads, including the cellars. (This version includes the main mod, so pick only one. Don't use both.)

[b]Note:[/b] If you're loading this mod for the first time, and your character is already inside a homestead interior, you'll need to exit and re-enter the home for the mod to take effect. This should only need to be done once. 

[i]Also available on the Workshop[/i] -[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=198216130] http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=198216130[/url].
author: Samular

files.name: Disable Hearthfire Background Music - Silent Cellars
